lines.text: The big insurance shot. Pick up your feet and walk with them, Wisey.
Your gag. You're a chorine. Why the sleigh ride?
Maybe I thought you were Santa Claus.
Do I look like Santa Claus?
You look like something I don't believe in.
Oh, I crack a nut from time to time.
Why didn't you tell me you was a chorine?
You were too young to be told.
Yeah but I bet never to the same place twice. Guys like you think just because a girl's in the chorus all you gotta do is buy her a dish of chow mein.
Listen, I was ready to shoot the bankroll on you. It ain't my fault if you short change yourself.
